record.title: PERMISSION FOR COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE TO FILE REPORT ON H.R. 2419, FARM, NUTRITION, AND BIOENERGY ACT OF 2007
record.narrative:
PERMISSION FOR COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE TO FILE REPORT ON H.R. 2419, FARM, NUTRITION, AND BIOENERGY ACT OF 2007 -- (House of Representatives - July 23, 2007)

[Page: H8257]

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: PETERSON
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Agriculture be permitted to have until midnight tonight, July 23, 2007, to file a report on H.R. 2419, the Farm, Nutrition, and Bioenergy Act of 2007.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Minnesota?
